client.model

Class Settlement

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.model.Settlement

  • public class Settlement
extends java.lang.Object
    Another piece owned by the player. Interacts with the player and the board. Must be purchased to be placed on the board.
    Domain: 0-1 Vertex Location
    Author:
    Chad

      • initializeLocation

        public void initializeLocation()
                        throws client.exceptions.ClientModelException
        Initializes the vertex location based off of the generic x and y coordinates given when the server data is casted into a settlement
        Throws:
        client.exceptions.ClientModelException
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        The vertex location now reflects the x and y coordinates of the model given by the server data
